description: Discover how Opulus NFT Marketplace is revolutionizing the music industry with blockchain technology, empowering artists through NFT monetization and enhancing fan engagement. Learn about innovative features, sustainability efforts, and future prospects in transforming music monetization.
keywords: Opulus, NFT Marketplace, blockchain in music, music NFTs, digital assets, fractional music ownership, artist-fan engagement, music industry transformation, sustainable blockchain, music monetization
title: Opulus NFT Marketplace: Transforming Music with Blockchain
